questions.explanation: 4 (2²), 9 (3²), and 16 (4²) are perfect squares. 20 is not a perfect square, so it is the odd one out.

questions.questionText: Find the odd one out: Apple, Mango, Carrot, Banana
questions.explanation: Apple, Mango, and Banana are fruits. Carrot is a vegetable, so it is the odd one out.
2, 3, and 5 are prime numbers. 9 is not a prime number (divisible by 3), so it is the odd one out.

questions.questionText: Find the odd one out: Dog, Cat, Cow, Table
questions.explanation: Dog, Cat, and Cow are animals (living beings). Table is a non-living object, so it is the odd one out.
